New Records: DeMar DeRozan scored the Kings’ first eight points in overtime
Key Match Events: Keegan Murray tipped in his own missed shot with 3.9 seconds to play to give Sacramento a one-point lead
DeMar DeRozan scored on a three-point play to start the overtime period and the Kings never trailed after that
Pre-Game Insights: The Suns played without Kevin Durant, who was injured Friday and will miss at least two weeks
Post-Match Reflections: The Kings snapped the Phoenix Suns’ winning streak at seven with a 127-118 win Sunday night
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Kings play at San Antonio on Monday. The Suns travel to play Utah on Tuesday for the In-Season tournament
Others: Bradley Beal led Phoenix (8-2) with 28 points
Devin Booker made a free throw to tie the game at 111
